home.heroSubtitle: World of Warcraft Guild - Tarren Mill EU
home.heroDescription: 100% Norwegian guild on Tarren Mill-EU, founded in 2022
home.guildDescription: Guttakrutt raiding guild on Tarren Mill-EU server. Our main team is led by Truedream and is aiming for Cutting Edge.
home.mainTeamDescription: Our main raid team raids Sunday and Wednesday from 19:20-23:00 CET.
home.secondTeamDescription: Our second team led by Spritney raids on Mondays from 20:00-23:00 CET.

recruitment.title: Join Guttakrutt
recruitment.description: We're currently looking for skilled players to join our raid teams for The War Within. Apply now to join one of the most active Norwegian guilds on Tarren Mill!

login.title: Login with Battle.net
login.description: Login with your Battle.net account to access your character profiles and guild member features.
login.privacy_notice: We only access your World of Warcraft characters and basic profile information.
login.no_posts: We will never post on your behalf.

profile.title: Your Profile
profile.characters_note: Characters will appear here after logging in
profile.connectionsSubtitle: Connect your Battle.net account to automatically import your characters.
profile.charactersSubtitle: View and manage your World of Warcraft characters
profile.subtitle: Manage your account, characters, and connections
profile.battleNetConnectedDesc: Your account is connected to Battle.net as {{battleTag}}
profile.battleNetNotConnectedDesc: Connect your Battle.net account to verify your World of Warcraft characters

connectBattleNet.title: Connect Battle.net Account
connectBattleNet.description: Link your Battle.net account to access more features
connectBattleNet.benefits: Connecting your Battle.net account allows you to automatically import your characters and access more features.

character.login_to_view: Log in to view your characters
character.no_characters_found: No characters found. Use the button to fetch them from Battle.net.
character.no_characters_yet: You don't have any characters yet
character.no_bnet_connected: Connect your Battle.net account to access your characters
character.fetch_error_description: There was an error retrieving your characters from Battle.net
